reviewText: This is an almost forgotton gem about a chinese gangster in the so called limehouse area of London. George Raft is wonderful as always, and yes, it is a bit odd to see him cast as an oriental, but I think he pulls it off. His character is a gangster with a heart who falls in love with a white girl, a big taboo in its day. Give it a try.
Not the best of George Raft.  Could not even watch all of the movie because did not find it interesting nor entertaining. Not a fan
